channel.title: SQL Server Big Data Cluster on Niels Berglund
channel.description: Recent content in SQL Server Big Data Cluster on Niels Berglund

item.title: Interesting Stuff - Week 41, 2021
item.description:
Throughout the week, I read a lot of blog-posts, articles, and so forth that has to do with things that interest me:

  • AI/data science
  • data in general
  • data architecture
  • streaming
  • distributed computing
  • SQL Server
  • transactions (both db as well as non db)
  • and other “stuff”

This blog-post is the “roundup” of the things that have been most interesting to me for the week just ending.
